import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {GETVIDEOCATEGORYDATA,USERID,TAG,GETVIDEOFILTERCONTENT} from '../../url'; import axios from 'axios'; import Not_Found from '../../Component/not_found/not_found'; import $ from 'jquery'; class ImageCategoryData extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={isLoading:true,cat_id:'',cat_name:'',not_found:false,category_data:[], current_page:0,total_pages:0,limit:20,total_result:0,filter_artist_data:[],keyword:''} this._nodes = new Map() } componentDidMount() { $(".filter_btn").click(function() { $(this).toggleClass("filter_on"); $(".category_page").toggleClass("fullwidth"); $(".side_filter").toggleClass("open_filter"); }); var cat_name=this.props.match.params.cat_name; var fcat_name=cat_name.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + cat_name.substr(1).toLowerCase(); this.setState({cat_id:this.props.match.params.cat_id,cat_name:fcat_name},function() { setTimeout(()=>this.setState({isLoading:true}),1000); this.getData(1,this.state.limit,''); this.getFilterContent(); }); } getData=(page,limit,keyword)=>{ axios.post(GETVIDEOCATEGORYDATA,{ 'user_id':USERID, 'tag':TAG, 'limit':limit, 'category_id':this.state.cat_id, }).then((res)=>{ if(res.data.success==1) { var response=res.data; this.setState({keyword:keyword,category_data:response.data.data,current_page:response.data.current_page,total_pages:response.data.total,total_result:response.total_result}); setTimeout(()=>this.setState({isLoading:true}),1000); } }).catch((error)=>{ this.setState({not_found:true}) }) } getFilterContent=()=>{ axios.post(GETVIDEOFILTERCONTENT,{ 'user_id':USERID, 'tag':TAG, 'category_id':this.state.cat_id, }).then((res)=>{ if(res.data.success==1) { var response=res.data; this.setState({filter_artist_data:response.data}); } }).catch((error)=>{ this.setState({not_found:true}) }) } componentDidUpdate() { if(this.props.match.params.gig_id!=this.state.gig_id ) { var cat_name=this.props.match.params.cat_name; var fcat_name=cat_name.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + cat_name.substr(1).toLowerCase(); this.setState({cat_id:this.props.match.params.cat_id,cat_name:fcat_name},function() { setTimeout(()=>this.setState({isLoading:true}),1000); this.getData(this.state.current_page,this.state.limit); }); } } playVideo = (e,id) => { const node = this._nodes.get(id); node.play() $('#load_'+id).hide(); //do stuff // You can use the play method as normal on your video ref }; pauseVideo = (e,id) => { $('#load_'+id).hide(); const node = this._nodes.get(id); node.pause(); }; render() { const {isLoading,not_found,category_data,cat_name,total_pages,total_result,filter_artist_data}=this.state; if(!not_found) { const Video_Listing=(category_data.length>0 && category_data.map((res,key)=>{ return(
{}]/g,'')).toLowerCase()}/${res.id}`}>
